it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class WeaponWithAlternative

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.Weapon
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.WeaponWithAlternative

  • public class WeaponWithAlternative
extends Weapon
    This class inherits from the basic weapon and adds an alternative attack that can be used instead of the basic one

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Attack alternativeAttack
      This property represents the alternative attack of the weapon, which can be used in place of the basic attack
      private java.util.List<Coin> alternativeAttackCost
      This property represents the cost that shall be paid to use the alternative attack, if the list is empty the attack is free

      • Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Weapon

        activeAttack, damagedTargets

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WeaponWithAlternative(Attack basicAttack, Attack alternativeAttack, java.lang.String name, java.util.List<Coin> reloadCost, java.util.List<Coin> acquisitionCost, java.util.List<Coin> alternativeAttackCost)
      This constructor assignes all the final values to the weapon, making it ready to be bought

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Attack getAlternativeAttack()
      This method gets the alternative attack of the weapon
      java.util.List<Coin> getAlternativeAttackCost()
      This method gets the cost of the alternative attack of the weapon

        chooseAttack, executeActiveAttack, getAcquisitionCost, getBasicAttack, getName, getReloadCost, isLoaded, setLoaded

    • Field Detail

      • alternativeAttack

        private final Attack alternativeAttack
        This property represents the alternative attack of the weapon, which can be used in place of the basic attack

      • alternativeAttackCost

        private final java.util.List<Coin> alternativeAttackCost
        This property represents the cost that shall be paid to use the alternative attack, if the list is empty the attack is free

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeaponWithAlternative

        public WeaponWithAlternative(Attack basicAttack,
                             Attack alternativeAttack,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.util.List<Coin> reloadCost,
                             java.util.List<Coin> acquisitionCost,
                             java.util.List<Coin> alternativeAttackCost)
        This constructor assignes all the final values to the weapon, making it ready to be bought
        Parameters:
        basicAttack - the basic attack of the weapon
        alternativeAttack - the alternative attack of the weapon
        name - a string with the name of the weapon
        reloadCost - a list of coin equal to the reload cost of the weapon
        acquisitionCost - a list of coin equal to the acquisition cost of the weapon
        alternativeAttackCost - a list of coin equal to the cost of the alternative attack
